department: Department of Public Works and Government Services (PSPC)
description: The Royal Canadian Mounted Police (RCMP), wishes to undertake a few naval architecture investigations and analysis. The results of which will help inform the refit specification package being written by others for the Pusher-Tug SPOONBILL.
full_summary:
==============================================================

### Invitation for Bids: EP168-231781_B - Naval Architecture - Pusher-Tug SPOONBILL

**Contract Notice Details**
---------------------------

*   **Reference Number**: WS3819865202
*   **Publication Date**: May 5, 2023
*   **Tender Closing Date**: May 19, 2023, 14:00:00
*   **Expected Contract Start Date**: To be determined
*   **Expected Contract End Date**: June 30, 2023

**Notice of Tender Opportunity**
-------------------------------

The Department of Public Works and Government Services (PSPC) invites contractors to submit bids on a Request for Proposal (RFP) under the Solicitation Number WS3819865202.

**Description of Services Required**
---------------------------------

The PSPC requires the services of a professional Naval Architect to undertake certain naval architecture research and analysis for the refit of the Pusher-Tug SPOONBILL. The successful contractor will provide the necessary expertise and support to help inform the development of the refit specification package.

### Key Requirements
--------------------

*   The contractor must be a registered Naval Architect or a professional engineer, or work under the supervision of a Professional Engineer.
*   The work must be completed in accordance with the specifications outlined in the RFP documents.

### Evaluation Criteria
---------------------

Bid pricing will be the sole evaluation criteria for this RFP.

**Trade Agreements**
-----------------

This tender is open to bidders who are eligible to contract under the Canadian Free Trade Agreement (CFTA), the Canada-Colombia Free Trade Agreement, the Canada-Honduras Free Trade Agreement, the Canada-Korea Free Trade Agreement (CKFTA), the Canada-Panama Free Trade Agreement, and the Canada-Chile Free Trade Agreement (CCFTA).

**Regions of Delivery**
---------------------

The contract is expected to be performed in the province of Manitoba.

**Contact Information**
--------------------

Patrick Wass, PSPC 

Email: [patrick.wass@tpsgc-pwgsc.ca](mailto:patrick.wass@tpsgc-pwgsc.ca)

This notice and the RFP documents can be downloaded from the Government of Canada's tendering website: [buyandsell.gc.ca](http://buyandsell.gc.ca). A copy of the RFP document will not be made available by any other means.

Only those approved contractors meeting the minimum  eligibility criteria may submit a bid. All other parties must formally register as a supplier before a deadline or fall
